Classif_variables.1: Positive: Good absorption, more than 30% HIA
Classif_variables.0: Negative: Poor absorption, less than 30% HIA

References: Wang, N.N.; Huang, C.; Dong, J.; Yao, Z.J.; Zhu, M.F.; Deng, Z.K.; Lv, B.; Lu, A.P.; Chen, A.F. & Cao, D.S. (2017). Predicting human intestinal absorption with modified random forest approach: a comprehensive evaluation of molecular representation, unbalanced data, and applicability domain issues. RSC Adv., 2017, 7, 19007.
